issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: TezTask - getting groups may fail (PartialGroupNameException in some tests)

comments.body: [~prasanth_j] can you take a look? a tiny patch.
Last attempt at HiveQA... this patch is pretty safe so I will commit it as is if this also doesn't run.
Can you submit the patch for ptest job to pick it up?
